name: Guts of Erdros
description:
Controls

A: Move Left

D: Move Right

J: Jump

K: Attack

W/S + K: Aim Attack

L: Dash

Good Luck!

(To play the game in fullscreen mode, you must click on the fullscreen button in the bottom right corner of the game screen THEN turn it on in the options menu. To exit fullscreen mode on Windows, press the 'escape' key twice. To exit it on Safari on a Mac, press option(alt) + F11.
